attributes.action: Reward Ray Mears with an OBE for  raising the intellectual profile of tribes often regarded as primitive
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Award an OBE to Ray Mears who has, through his television programmes, highlighted the intellectual and craft capabilities of peoples often regarded as primitive, and by studying these peoples has helped preserve skills and knowledge that my soon be lost to the world as civilisation destroys their environments.
